info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 02 at 6:44PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern New Haven and northern Middlesex Counties through 730 PM EDT... At 643 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Middlebury, or over Waterbury, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Waterbury, Meriden, Middletown, Wallingford, Naugatuck, Southbury, Wolcott, Durham, Hamden, Cheshire, Cromwell, Portland, Prospect, Haddam and Middlebury. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
